title: How do I adjust the photo size?
answer:
The photo size depends on the camera resolution. The higher the resolution, the larger the photo. 

 For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=96682). Select the Camera tab and then select Resolution to adjust the camera resolution. 

 For EMUI 3.0, enter the camera viewfinder mode and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=96683). Then select Settings > Resolution to adjust the camera resolution. 

 The size of a photo can also be changed by opening the photo using Gallery or another third-party app and cropping the image.
